quoteText: For example, if you create or log into your WordPress.com account through a social media service (like Facebook or Google) or if you connect your account to a social media service, we will receive information from that service (such as your username, basic profile information, and friends list) via the authorization procedures used by that service.
title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties
